publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3440 Bristow Muldoon: Congratulations to Chris Hoyâ€”That the Parliament sends its congratulations to Chris Hoy following his latest success in becoming World Champion in the 1km time trial cycling event at Copenhagen on 26 September 2002; recognises that this is the latest in an on-going series of achievements by Scottish cyclists dating back to the 1970s, and believes that the future success of cyclists in Scotland would be enhanced by the Scottish Executive and sportscotland working with representatives of the sport to develop all-weather cycling facilities in Scotland.
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Rhona Brankin*, Helen Eadie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Iain Smith*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Irene Oldfather*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-3440 Congratulations to Chris Hoy (lodged on 27 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
